channel.title: American Beauty
channel.description:
I just watched the movie American Beauty. It's brilliant; such a good watch. Don't trust the trailers for it, I recommend watching it before looking at the trailer. What's even better than the movie is the soundtrack score done by Thomas Newman. It's a dark satirical movie about forbidden desires and having so little to lose that you finally live.
Has anyone else seen it?
